thread.title: Set phasers for BURN: Dana Loesch TORCHES Pence-mocking George Takei
thread.title_full: Set phasers for BURN: Dana Loesch TORCHES Pence-mocking George Takei

author: Doug P.
title: Set phasers for BURN: Dana Loesch TORCHES Pence-mocking George Takei
text:
Set phasers for BURN: Dana Loesch TORCHES Pence-mocking George Takei Posted at 2:09   Doug P.   
Among those jumping on the “attempt to mock Mike Pence’s marriage philosophy” bandwagon is actor George Takei: Pence won't have dinner alone with a woman who's not his wife. Literally, he won't, ever: No woman in her right mind would sit through that. 
— George Takei (@GeorgeTakei) March 31, 2017 
Dana Loesch had a wonderful piece of advice to offer: If you want Pence to stay out of your relationships, try staying out of his. https://t.co/xAjY7M5bf4 
— Dana Loesch (@DLoesch) March 31, 2017 Trending 
Boom! Well, there it is. @DLoesch YOU WIN THE INTERNET TODAY! Best retort ever!
